results.title: Effective Control of Supraventricular Tachycardia in Neonates May Requires Combination Pharmacologic Therapy
results.text_hl: Introduction: @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@Supraventricular tachycardia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@SVT@@@) is one of the @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ that can occur in newborns.

citations.NLM: Lim YT, Kim YH, Kwon JE. Effective Control of Supraventricular Tachycardia in Neonates May Requires Combination Pharmacologic Therapy J Clin Med. 2022 Jun 8;11(12):. PMID: 35743350

results.title: Supraventricular Tachycardia in Pregnancy: Gestational and Labor Differences in Treatment
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ are effective methods of treating @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@SVT@@@, which can be used during the second and third trimesters.

citations.NLM: Ibetoh CN, Stratulat E, Liu F, Wuni GY, Bahuva R, Shafiq MA, Gattas BS, Gordon DK. Supraventricular Tachycardia in Pregnancy: Gestational and Labor Differences in Treatment Cureus. 2021 Oct;13(10):e18479. PMID: 34659918
citations.BibTeX: @article{34659918, title={Supraventricular Tachycardia in Pregnancy: Gestational and Labor Differences in Treatment}, author={Ibetoh CN and Stratulat E and Liu F and Wuni GY and Bahuva R and Shafiq MA and Gattas BS and Gordon DK}, journal={Cureus}, volume={13}, number={10}, pages={e18479}}

results.title: SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY.
results.text_hl: He was started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and was asymptomatic until a year later when he presented with the second recorded @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@supraventricular tachycardia@@@.

citations.NLM: Krmek N, Jegdić V, Rode M. SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY. Acta Clin Croat. 2024 Apr;63(1):197-202. PMID: 39959329

results.title: Clinical, electrocardiographic, and diagnostic imaging features and outcomes in cats with electrocardiographic diagnosis of ventricular pre-excitation: a retrospective study of 23 cases (2010-2022).
results.text_hl: Heart rate during @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@SVT@@@ ranged from 310 to 420 bpm (median: 375 bpm).

citations.NLM: Gavic EA, Stauthammer CD, Masters AK, Morgan KRS, Rendahl A, Ciccozzi M, Beekmann K, George R, Herrold E, Markovic LE, Schober K, Tjostheim SS, Wright K. Clinical, electrocardiographic, and diagnostic imaging features and outcomes in cats with electrocardiographic diagnosis of ventricular pre-excitation: a retrospective study of 23 cases (2010-2022).
